org.onyxplatform.api.java

Class Triggers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onyxplatform.api.java.OnyxVector
      • org.onyxplatform.api.java.Triggers

  • public class Triggers
extends OnyxVector
    Triggers are a set of Trigger objects that can be collectively applied to a window or windows associated with an onyx job. the Triggers object derives from OnyxVector.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.onyxplatform.api.java.OnyxVector

        vContents

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triggers()
      Constructs a new, empty Triggers object using the OnyxVector superconstructor.
      Triggers(Triggers ts)
      Constructs a new Triggers object using an existing Triggers object (uses the existing Trigger collection as content).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Triggers addTrigger(Trigger te)
      Adds an existing Trigger to the Triggers content vector.
      clojure.lang.PersistentVector triggers()
      Returns the trigger objects contained by the Triggers container as a vector of maps, rather than objects.

        addElement, addElements, toString, toVector

    • Constructor Detail

      • Triggers

        public Triggers()
        Constructs a new, empty Triggers object using the OnyxVector superconstructor.

      • Triggers

        public Triggers(Triggers ts)
        Constructs a new Triggers object using an existing Triggers object (uses the existing Trigger collection as content). Uses OnyxVector superconstructor.
        Parameters:
        ts - existing Triggers object to use for content

    • Method Detail

      • addTrigger

        public Triggers addTrigger(Trigger te)
        Adds an existing Trigger to the Triggers content vector. Returns the Triggers object so that methods can be chained.
        Parameters:
        te - Trigger to add to the Triggers content
        Returns:
        the updated Triggers object

      • triggers

        public clojure.lang.PersistentVector triggers()
        Returns the trigger objects contained by the Triggers container as a vector of maps, rather than objects.
        Returns:
        vector of map representations of the triggers contained by the triggers object.
